hero.title: Your path to recovery and well-being starts here
hero.description: Professional physiotherapy clinic dedicated to your health and movement.

aboutAndServices.title: Our Clinic
aboutAndServices.description: At ELON Physio, our mission is to provide you with personalized and effective care, using the most advanced techniques to ensure a fast and lasting recovery. We are committed to excellence and the well-being of every one of our patients.
aboutAndServices.serviceDescription: We offer a wide range of physiotherapy services tailored to your specific needs. Our key services include:

first.title: Sports Physiotherapy
first.description: Specialized care for sports injuries and physical preparation.

second.title: Manual Therapy
second.description: Hands-on techniques to relieve pain, improve mobility, and restore joint function.

third.title: Post-Surgical Rehabilitation
third.description: Personalized programs for safe and effective recovery after surgery.

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.description: ELON Physio is home to a multidisciplinary team of physiotherapists and specialists dedicated to your well-being. Here are some of our professionals, but our full team is much larger and ready to support you throughout your recovery process.

first.name: Dr. Juan Pérez
first.description: Specialist in the treatment and prevention of sports injuries.

second.name: Dr. Carlos Rodríguez
second.description: Expert in manual therapy techniques to improve mobility and reduce pain.

third.name: Dr. Sandra Martínez
third.description: Focused on supporting patients through safe and effective recovery after surgery.
